title: Support Keycard authentication for transactions

milestone.description:
**1. Finish anything that wasn't completed in the previous 0.15 cycle**

- And fix bugs as usual.  We need to keep tech. debt at a roughly fixed level as we grow out functionality, can't let it accumulate! ;-)

**2. Complete initial airdrop functionality**
- Airdrop history screens
- Ability to airdrop based on in-Community activity (No. of msg, No. msg in time range, joining a community, length of community membership)  Ability to combine multiple attributes into an airdrop
- Ability to token gate airdrops
- Live airdrop gas estimation when setting up airdrop


**3. Community Admin functionality enhancements**
- optional service to once a month auto-kick all members who haven't been online for between 30 and 60 days (e.g. auto-kick members whose profile information like Name, Avatar, etc... can no longer be fetched)

**4. QR scanner**
- Needed for private key transfer
- Ethereum key QRs (send modal triggered)
- User Share URL in a QR (opens user profile dialogue) 
- Community and Channel inside Community URL in QRs (takes user to Community or Channel in Community)

**5. Chat functionality enhancements**
- Introduce @channel as a new type of global @ mention.  This @ mention only @ mention's everyone who has posted a message in a channel in the last 30 days 
- Introduce the ability to search the users in the right side members/users bar.  At the same time, make any adaptations needed so that the right side members/users bar can scale to 10,000 users.

**6. Telegram history import into a single channel in an existing community**


**--- Wallet Team ---**

1. WalletConnect 2.0 support

2. Total balance graphs for 'All accounts' and each individual account

3. Advanced transaction signing

body:
### Description

Please follow discussion here https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/8529#discussion_r1036883016

we need to support keycard verification in the following 
1. Send Tx
2. Buy stickers
3. Ens buy/release
